sentences.sContent: Everyone in favor of the amendment, say "aye!"
sentences.sContent_eng: Everyone in favor of the amendment, say "aye!"
sentences.sCn: 所有赞成修改章程的，请说“赞成”！

sentences.sContent: The Senate vote was 89 to 11, with 37 Democrats voting aye and only one Republican voting nay. Reaganomics had officially begun.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Senate vote was 89 to 11, with 37 Democrats voting aye and only one Republican voting nay. Reaganomics had officially begun.
sentences.sCn: 参议员以89票对11票表决通过，赞成票中包括37位民主党议员，只有一位共和党议员投了反对票。

phrases.pCn: （表惊喜或自己猜疑等得到证实时说）原来如此；[航]（海员等回答上级命令时说）明白

remMethod.val: a + ye (看作yes， 是) → 一张同意的票 → 赞成票

trans.tranOther: The ayes are the people who vote in favour of something
used to say yes when voting
